situation.title: Foreigners living in the CZ
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for foreigners living in the Czech Republic.

content.processed:
Statute

The ban on entering the Czech Republic for foreigners does not apply for valid long-term visa holders, individuals with long-term residence permission, or valid residence card on Czech territory issued by the relevant authority in the Czech Republic. There is also an exception for foreigners with a valid short-term visa issued after May 11th, 2020.

All necessary information about conditions of entering the Czech Republic is accessible on Ministry of Interior websites. The summary is also available in English.

In case of any doubts or questions please do not hesitate to contact the Czech Ministry of Interior on +420 974 820 680, choice #3 (Mon. – Thu., 8:00 – 16:00; Fri. 8:00 – 12:00) or by email. Both services (phone/mail) are provided also in English.

If you have an acute legal problem, you can contact the free telephone consultation on this website.
